author: NetworkChuck
description:
Start using n8n with a VPS via hostinger.com/ncn8n + use code NETWORKCHUCK for a discount. 

You NEED to use n8n RIGHT NOW!! It’s a powerful, free, open-source automation tool that will change your life. It destroys Zapier and IFTTT thanks to its power, and its privacy. In this video, I’ll walk you through exactly how to set up n8n, explain the basics, and help you build your very first automation workflows. Grab your coffee, let’s automate EVERYTHING.
